title: A.B.C. Warriors: The Volgan War, Volume 1
description: Mars, the far future. War droids created for a conflict that ended centuries ago, the A.B.C. Warrios are resistant to Atomic, Bacterial and Chemical warfare. Recruited to bring peace to the civil war-ravaged frontier colonies on the Red Planet, the Meknificent Seven are currently reminiscing over their years spent fighting in the Volgan War...
author: Pat  Mills
